about.title: About
about.text: I'm a brazillian FullStack Developer with a long entrepreunership story. As a freelancer, I've done webapplications and websites for a lot of clients, and even started some business. Today, I work for a amazing startup called Nvoip, where I'm allways learning a lot and improving my skills, allways looking for challenges!

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Some of my favourite projects. Click on image to visit
projects.project1: A Typescript Fullstack blog that automatically generates weekly content using A.I and cron jobs
projects.project2: A institutional page for a ONG called 'NOSSA ONG' made with ReactJs
projects.project3: A cripto converter made with Mercado Pago API, Bulma and ReactJs
projects.project4: How Many Days Left to World Cup
